entry.title: Unacceptable marriage pressure on Churches
entry.summary:
[...] It is unacceptable “that local Churches should be subjected to pressure in this matter and that international bodies should make financial aid to poor countries dependent on the introduction of laws to establish ‘mar riage’ between persons of the same sex”. [...]
Pope Francis, Amoris Laetitia, #251 https://w2.vatican.va/content/dam/francesco/pdf/apost_exhortations/documents/papa-francesco_esortazione-ap_20160319_amoris-laetitia_en.pdf
